languages.text: {n}Маражай несколько секунд смотрит на вас, словно впитывая в себя каждую вашу эмоцию. Потом усмехается и подходит ближе.{/n} "Ну же, {name}. Не вижу повода прекращать. Я насытился на сегодня, а ты... пойдем — я знаю, как тебя утешить". {n}Его дыхание щекочет вам ухо, а узкие ладони скользят по вашему телу, словно ненароком забираясь под одежду.{/n}

{n}Marazhai stares at you for a few seconds as if he is soaking up your every emotion. Then he grins and moves closer.{/n} "Come on, {name}. I see no reason to stop. I have had enough for today, but you... come — I know how to comfort you." {n}His breath tickles your ear, and his narrow hands slide down your body, casually straying under your clothes.{/n}

Я насытился на сегодня, а ты... пойдем — я знаю, как тебя утешить". {n}Его дыхание щекочет вам ухо, а узкие ладони скользят по вашему телу, словно ненароком забираясь под одежду.{/n}

I have had enough for today, but you... come — I know how to comfort you." {n}His breath tickles your ear, and his narrow hands slide down your body, casually straying under your clothes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋又盯着你看了一会儿，仿佛在咀嚼你的每种情绪。随后，他笑了起来，走到你身边。{/n}“来吧，{name}，没必要就此打住。我今天已经享受得够多了，不过你……来吧——我知道如何抚慰你。”{n}他的吐息让你耳朵发痒，纤长的双手漫不经心低探入你的衣摆，贴着你的皮肤不住游走。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at you for a few seconds as if he is soaking up your every emotion. Then he grins and moves closer.{/n} "Come on, {name}. I see no reason to stop. I have had enough for today, but you... come — I know how to comfort you." {n}His breath tickles your ear, and his narrow hands slide down your body, casually straying under your clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋又盯着你看了一会儿，仿佛在咀嚼你的每种情绪。随后，他笑了起来，走到你身边。{/n}“来吧，{name}，没必要就此打住。我今天已经享受得够多了，不过你……来吧——我知道如何抚慰你。”{n}他的吐息让你耳朵发痒，纤长的双手漫不经心低探入你的衣摆，贴着你的皮肤不住游走。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te mira fijamente durante unos segundos como si estuviese absorbiendo todas tus emociones. Luego esboza una sonrisa burlona y se acerca a ti.{/n} «Vamos, {name}. No veo necesidad de parar. Yo ya he tenido bastante por hoy, pero tú... Ven, yo sé cómo consolarte». {n}Su aliento te produce un cosquilleo en la oreja, y sus esbeltas manos bajan deslizándose por tu cuerpo, palpándote despreocupadamente por debajo de la ropa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at you for a few seconds as if he is soaking up your every emotion. Then he grins and moves closer.{/n} "Come on, {name}. I see no reason to stop. I have had enough for today, but you... come — I know how to comfort you." {n}His breath tickles your ear, and his narrow hands slide down your body, casually straying under your clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te mira fijamente durante unos segundos como si estuviese absorbiendo todas tus emociones. Luego esboza una sonrisa burlona y se acerca a ti.{/n} «Vamos, {name}. No veo necesidad de parar. Yo ya he tenido bastante por hoy, pero tú... Ven, yo sé cómo consolarte». {n}Su aliento te produce un cosquilleo en la oreja, y sus esbeltas manos bajan deslizándose por tu cuerpo, palpándote despreocupadamente por debajo de la ropa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous contemple quelques secondes, comme s'il tentait d'absorber chacune de vos émotions. Puis il vous adresse un sourire en se rapprochant de vous.{/n} « Allons, {name}. Ne nous arrêtons pas là. Mes désirs sont à présent assouvis, mais les vôtres... Approchez, laissez-moi vous réconforter. » {n}Son souffle chatouille votre oreille et ses mains fines serpentent sur votre poitrine, se faufilant négligemment sous vos vêtements.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at you for a few seconds as if he is soaking up your every emotion. Then he grins and moves closer.{/n} "Come on, {name}. I see no reason to stop. I have had enough for today, but you... come — I know how to comfort you." {n}His breath tickles your ear, and his narrow hands slide down your body, casually straying under your clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous contemple quelques secondes, comme s'il tentait d'absorber chacune de vos émotions. Puis il vous adresse un sourire en se rapprochant de vous.{/n} « Allons, {name}. Ne nous arrêtons pas là. Mes désirs sont à présent assouvis, mais les vôtres... Approchez, laissez-moi vous réconforter. » {n}Son souffle chatouille votre oreille et ses mains fines serpentent sur votre poitrine, se faufilant négligemment sous vos vêtements.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai starrt dich einige Sekunden an, so als würde er jede deiner Emotionen förmlich aufsaugen. Er grinst und kommt näher.{/n} "Kommt schon, {name}. Ich sehe keinen Grund aufzuhören. Für heute habe ich genug, aber Ihr ... kommt – ich weiß, wie ich Euch tröste." {n}Sein Atem kitzelt dein Ohr und seine schmalen Hände gleiten an deinem Körper runter, dabei streifen sie dir ganz beiläufig die Kleidung vom Körper.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at you for a few seconds as if he is soaking up your every emotion. Then he grins and moves closer.{/n} "Come on, {name}. I see no reason to stop. I have had enough for today, but you... come — I know how to comfort you." {n}His breath tickles your ear, and his narrow hands slide down your body, casually straying under your clothes.{/n}

Ich sehe keinen Grund aufzuhören. Für heute habe ich genug, aber Ihr ... kommt – ich weiß, wie ich Euch tröste." {n}Sein Atem kitzelt dein Ohr und seine schmalen Hände gleiten an deinem Körper runter, dabei streifen sie dir ganz beiläufig die Kleidung vom Körper.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは数秒間、あなたのあらゆる感情を浴びようとするかのように見つめる。そして、ニヤリと笑って近づいてきた。{/n}「さあ、{name}。やめる理由などない。俺は今日の分はもう十分に味わったが、お前は…どうかな。俺は、お前を慰めるための術を知っている」{n}彼の息があなたの耳をくすぐり、その細い手があなたの体を滑り落ちて服の下へと通り過ぎる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at you for a few seconds as if he is soaking up your every emotion. Then he grins and moves closer.{/n} "Come on, {name}. I see no reason to stop. I have had enough for today, but you... come — I know how to comfort you." {n}His breath tickles your ear, and his narrow hands slide down your body, casually straying under your clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは数秒間、あなたのあらゆる感情を浴びようとするかのように見つめる。そして、ニヤリと笑って近づいてきた。{/n}「さあ、{name}。やめる理由などない。俺は今日の分はもう十分に味わったが、お前は…どうかな。俺は、お前を慰めるための術を知っている」{n}彼の息があなたの耳をくすぐり、その細い手があなたの体を滑り落ちて服の下へと通り過ぎる。{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at you for a few seconds as if he is soaking up your every emotion. Then he grins and moves closer.{/n} "Come on, . I see no reason to stop. I have had enough for today, but you... come — I know how to comfort you." {n}His breath tickles your ear, and his narrow hands slide down your body, casually straying under your clothes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, her bir duygunu emiyormuşçasına sana bakıyor. Ardından sırıtarak yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Hadi ama {name}. Durmamız için bir neden göremiyorum. Bugün için bana bu kadarı yeter ama sen... Gel buraya. Seni nasıl rahatlatacağımı biliyorum." {n}Nefesi, kulağına baştan çıkarıcı geliyor. İncecik elleri, vücudunda aşağı kayarak kıyafetlerinin altında gelişigüzel gezinmeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai stares at you for a few seconds as if he is soaking up your every emotion. Then he grins and moves closer.{/n} "Come on, {name}. I see no reason to stop. I have had enough for today, but you... come — I know how to comfort you." {n}His breath tickles your ear, and his narrow hands slide down your body, casually straying under your clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, her bir duygunu emiyormuşçasına birkaç saniye boyunca sana bakıyor. Ardından sırıtarak yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Hadi ama {name}. Durmamız için bir neden göremiyorum. Bugün için bana bu kadarı yeter ama sen... Gel buraya. Seni nasıl rahatlatacağımı biliyorum. {n}Nefesi, kulağına baştan çıkarıcı geliyor. İncecik elleri, vücudunda aşağı kayarak kıyafetlerinin altında gelişigüzel gezinmeye başlıyor.{/n}
